medicinal_herb.name: Medicinal Herb
medicinal_herb.description: Restores 30 HP to a single ally.

strong_medicine.name: Strong Medicine
strong_medicine.description: Restores 60 HP to a single ally.

single_phial.name: Single Phial
single_phial.description: Restores 10 MP to a single ally.

magic_water.name: Magic Water
magic_water.description: Restores 30 MP to a single ally.

antidotal_herb.name: Antidotal Herb
antidotal_herb.description: Cures a single ally of poison and severe poison.

moonwort_bulb.name: Moonwort Bulb
moonwort_bulb.description: Cures a single ally of paralysis.

smelling_salts.name: Smelling Salts
smelling_salts.description: Cures a single ally of confusion and sleep.

panacea.name: Panacea
panacea.description: Cures a single ally of any ailments that afflict them.

yggdrasil_leaf.name: Yggdrasil Leaf
yggdrasil_leaf.description: Revives a single fallen ally and restores half of their HP.

antimagic_powder.name: Antimagic Powder
antimagic_powder.description: Prevents a single enemy from using magic spells.

bad_medicine.name: Bad Medicine
bad_medicine.description: Inflicts a single enemy with a range of debilitating effects.

pretty_pebble.name: Pretty Pebble
pretty_pebble.description: A small stone that cannn sting quite sharply if thrown with enough force. Inflicts minor damage to a single enemy when used in battle.

monster_manure.name: Monster Manure
monster_manure.description: A pong deposit that can be pitched at one's opponents. Inflicts minor damage to a single enemy when used in battle.

monster_munchies.name: Monster Munchies
monster_munchies.description: A meaty morsel that monsters love. Feed to a monster to very slightly increase the likelihood of it wanting to join you.

smoked_sirloin.name: Smoked Sirloin
smoked_sirloin.description: A tender treat that monsters adore. Feed to a monster to slightly increase the likelihood of it wanting to join you.

manky_meat.name: Manky Meat
manky_meat.description: A piece of putrid flesh that exudes a sour stennch. Feed to a monster to very slightly increase the likelihood of it wanting to join you, but also poison it in the process.

seed_of_life.name: Seed of Life
seed_of_life.description: Raises the max. HP of a single ally by 3. Note that each monster type has an upper limit to its max. HP that cannot be exceeded.

seed_of_strength.name: Seed of Strength
seed_of_strength.description: Raises the attack of a single ally by 3. Note that each monster type has an upper limit to its attack that cannot be exceeded.

seed_of_agility.name: Seed of Agility
seed_of_agility.description: Raises the agility of a single ally by 3. Note that each monster type has an upper limit to its agility that cannot be exceeded.

mini_medal.name: Mini Medal
mini_medal.description: Collectible medals that can be swapped with the medallist for an array of prizes. Drop by their counter in the Maulosseum in the lower echelon of the Circle of Conquest to see what's on offer.

red_travelite.name: Red Travelite
red_travelite.description: A red crystal that was forged by the ancient elves. It contains a magical energy that allows travel to previously inaccessible areas of Nadiria.

yellow_travelite.name: Yellow Travelite
yellow_travelite.description: A yellow crystal that was forged by the ancient elves. It contains a magical energy that allows travel to previously inaccessible areas of Nadiria.
